alert.note: Alert for Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 19 at 5:55PM EDT until March 19 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Schuylkill County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 555 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Mcadoo to Tuscarora to Port Carbon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tamaqua, Schuylkill Haven, Orwigsburg, Mcadoo, Port Carbon, Hometown, Tuscarora, New Philadelphia, Friedensburg, Renningers, Delano, McKeansburg, Coaldale, Snyders, Lake Wynonah, Cressona, Palo Alto, Grier City-Park Crest, Auburn and Deer Lake. This includes Interstate 81 from mile markers 134 to 139. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
